text: Dato' Seri Dr Wan Azizah binti Wan Ismail (Jawi: وان عزيزه بنت وان اسماعيل; born 3 December 1952) is a Malaysian politician. She is the first female Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia and the Minister of Women, Family and Community Development since 12 May 2018, during the Mahathir Mohamad cabinet. She is the Member of Parliament for Pandan. She is the first woman to hold the position in Malaysia. Currently, she is the President of the Pakatan Harapan coalition and was President of the People's Justice Party (Malay: Parti Keadilan Rakyat) from 1999 until 2018 and was elected Selangor State Legislative Assembly member for Kajang until May 2018. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Civil rights activists Category:Living people Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of Malaysia Category:Malaysian activists Category:People from Selangor
title: Wan Azizah Wan Ismail
